text: allah oru timaiyai um'mait tintumpati ceytal atai avanait tavira (veru evarum) nikka mutiyatu; avan umakku oru nanmai ceyya nativittal avanatu arulait tatuppavar evarumillai tan atiyarkalil avan natiyavarukke atanai alikkinran - avan mikavum mannippavanakavum, mikka karunaiyutaiyavanakavum ullan
